content:
Submitting a Subscription

  • Subscription with Job

    • Policy: OK if end-user is allowed to print
    • Job and Printer events
      • Job events: Only this Job
      • Printer events: Only while this Job is active

  • Profile outside of Job

    • Policy: OK if “operator”
    • Job and Printer events
      • Job Events: All jobs
      • Printer Events: Any/All printer event
